articles.title: Three Americans released in US-China prisoner exchange - BBC.com
articles.description: The exchange was reportedly months in the making, and included the release of at least one Chinese citizen in US custody.
articles.content:
Three Americans detained in China were released in exchange for three Chinese prisoners in the US, after the Biden administration negotiated a prisoner swap.
Mark Swidan, Kai Li, and John Leung are … [+2842 chars]
